mapper.sql: id, mid, mname, start_time, end_time, mcity, mstates, proid, cityid, address, contacts, url, mphone, content
mapper.select:
select
from con_meeting
mid LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{mid}), '%')
and mname LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{mname}), '%')
and mstates LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{mstates}), '%')
and start_time > #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}
and end_time < #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}
mapper.insert: insert into con_meeting (id, mid, mname, start_time, end_time, mcity, mstates, proid, cityid, address, contacts, url, mphone, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{mcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mstates,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{proid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update con_meeting
mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mname = #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE},
mcity = #{mcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mstates = #{mstates,jdbcType=INTEGER},
proid = #{proid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
cityid = #{cityid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mphone = #{mphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update con_meeting set mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mname = #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=DATE}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, mcity = #{mcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mstates = #{mstates,jdbcType=INTEGER}, proid = #{proid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cityid = #{cityid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contacts = #{contacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mphone = #{mphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
